title: PES for engineering worth it?
content:
Thinking of joining PES for engineering.
How is life der 
Ragging and all

comments.body: im still a fresher so i cannot say much, wait till a senior responds

DON’T come to PES
⚠️⚠️⚠️
Mental health? Gone.
🧠❌
Sleep? What’s that?
😵‍💫☕️🕒
Exam halls = war zones
🎓➡️💀
Labs? Torture chambers
🔌🔥📉😭
Crying is part of the curriculum
😢📚😢

PES = Pain Every Second
🚫🏫 RUN WHILE YOU CAN
🏃‍♀️💨💨💨

BRO ASKED WHY ⁉️
HERE'S WHY:

I WOKE UP AT 6AM 
⏰➡️💢
I WROTE 20 PAGES FOR 2 MARKS
📝📝📝➡️2️⃣
THE LAB INCHARGE BREATHES DOWN MY NECK
😤🔌📉
I CRIED IN THE BATHROOM AFTER VIVA
🚽😭
I HAVEN’T SLEPT SINCE MIDSEM
😵‍💫☕😵‍💫
I HEAR “PES” AND MY EYE TWITCHES
👁️⚡

THAT’S WHY BRO
nah imo skill issue, it aint that bad lol
No ragging and all that, but it's really not worth it anymore
Nah enough of the same question we need to start scaring these kids away
Now 10+40k per year that's what my dad told.
Report such posts. I'll lock them.
